name: Vodka: Cosmopolitan
description: A little more dressy than the working-class vodka cranberry. The cosmopolitan is just that, a little sip of sophistication (and a throw-back to the “Sex and the City” girls).

recipeInstructions.text: Add lime juice, triple sec and cranberry juice to the vodka and soda. Shake and strain into a chilled glass. Garnish: orange twist.
